newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Hamas denies it behind Gaza suicide attacks.
newsitem.headline: Hamas denies it behind Gaza suicide attacks.

text.p: A Hamas official denied the Islamic fundamentalist group carried out two suicide bombings near Jewish settlements in the Gaza Strip on Tuesday and blamed Israel for the attacks that injured five Palestinians.
"This has absolutely nothing to do with the Islamic movement or Hamas," Sayed Abu Musameh, a told Reuters.

"This bombing was done by Israeli intelligence and its (Palestinian) collaborators in an attempt to create an internal problem between the Islamic movement and the Palestinian Authority," Abu Musameh said.
Hamas's military wing, the Izz el-Deen al-Qassam Brigades, usually claims respsonsiblity for attacks in leaflets and through telephone calls to news organisations.
A telephone caller told Israeli police that Hamas carried out a suicide bombing in a Tel Aviv cafe that killed three Israeli women on March 21.
Islamic Jihad, a smaller Palestinian militant group, has in the past carried out attacks on isolated Jewish settlements in the PLO-ruled Gaza Strip.
